languages.text: "Твое рвение похвально, однако мы не оставим поисков до тех пор, пока не уничтожим скульптора плоти... Или же не узнаем о его кончине. Разделимся же. Если ты доберешься до гемункула первым и прервешь его жизнь, наши провидцы почувствуют это, и мы покинем мир".

traits.locale_text: "Твое рвение похвально, однако мы не оставим поисков до тех пор, пока не уничтожим скульптора плоти... Или же не узнаем о его кончине. Разделимся же. Если ты доберешься до гемункула первым и прервешь его жизнь, наши провидцы почувствуют это, и мы покинем мир".

languages.text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."
languages.original_text: "Твое рвение похвально, однако мы не оставим поисков до тех пор, пока не уничтожим скульптора плоти... Или же не узнаем о его кончине. Разделимся же. Если ты доберешься до гемункула первым и прервешь его жизнь, наши провидцы почувствуют это, и мы покинем мир".

traits.locale_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... Or until we are presented with the proof of his demise. Let us go separate ways. If you reach the haemonculus first and cut his life short, our seers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

"Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... Or until we are presented with the proof of his demise. Let us go separate ways. If you reach the haemonculus first and cut his life short, our seers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

"Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... Or until we are presented with the proof of his demise. Let us go separate ways. If you reach the haemonculus first and cut his life short, our seers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

"Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... Or until we are presented with the proof of his demise. Let us go separate ways. If you reach the haemonculus first and cut his life short, our seers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

"Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

"Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

languages.text: «Tu entusiasmo es digno de encomio, pero no abandonaremos la búsqueda hasta que el escultor de carne haya sido destruido... o hasta que obtengamos pruebas de su muerte. Sigámoslo por separado. Si hallas primero al hemónculo y acabas con su vida, nuestros videntes lo presentirán y nos marcharemos de este mundo».
languages.original_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

traits.locale_text: «Tu entusiasmo es digno de encomio, pero no abandonaremos la búsqueda hasta que el escultor de carne haya sido destruido... o hasta que obtengamos pruebas de su muerte. Vayamos cada uno por nuestro lado. Si hallas primero al hemónculo y acabas con su vida, nuestros videntes lo presentirán y nos marcharemos de este mundo».

languages.text: “你的热情值得称赞，但我们也会继续寻找，直到我们消灭血肉雕刻者……或是看到他死亡的证据。我们分头行动吧。如果你先找到血伶人，消灭了他，我们的先知会感觉到。在这之后，我们就会离开这个世界。”
languages.original_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

traits.locale_text: “你的热情值得称赞，但我们也会继续寻找，直到我们消灭血肉雕刻者……或是看到他死亡的证据。我们分头行动吧。如果你先找到血伶人，消灭了他，我们的先知会感觉到。在这之后，我们就会离开这个世界。”

languages.text: « Votre enthousiasme est louable, mais sachez que nous n'abandonnerons pas nos recherches avant d'avoir éliminé nous-mêmes le sculpteur de chair... ou reçu la preuve de sa mort. Pourchassons-le chacun de notre côté. Si vous trouvez l'hémoncule en premier et parvenez à le tuer, nos Grands Prophètes le sentiront ; alors, nous quitterons ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

traits.locale_text: « Votre enthousiasme est louable, mais sachez que nous n'abandonnerons pas nos recherches avant d'avoir éliminé nous-mêmes le sculpteur de chair... ou reçu la preuve de sa mort. Partons chacun de notre côté. Si vous trouvez l'hémoncule en premier et parvenez à le tuer, nos prophètes le sentiront ; alors, nous quitterons ce monde. »

languages.text: 「お前の熱心さは称賛に値するものだが、我々は屍肉の彫刻家が滅びるまで捜索を放棄することはない…あるいは、彼が死んだという証拠を提示されるまではな。別々に彼を追及しよう。もしお前が先にハモンキュラスに到達し、彼の命を絶つならば、我々の予見者がそれを察知し、我々はこの世界から立ち去るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の熱心さは称賛に値するものだが、我々は屍肉の彫刻家が滅びるまで捜索を放棄することはない…あるいは、彼が死んだという証拠を提示されるまではな。別々の道を行こう。もしお前が先にハモンキュラスに到達し、彼の命を絶つならば、我々の予見者がそれを察知し、我々はこの世界から立ち去るだろう」

languages.text: "Euer Eifer ist bewundernswert, doch wir werden unsere Suche nicht aufgeben, bis der Fleischbildhauer vernichtet ist ... Oder bis wir einen Beweis für sein Ableben erhalten haben. Gehen wir getrennte Wege. Wenn Ihr den Haemonculus zuerst findet und sein Leben beendet, werden unsere Runenpropheten es spüren und wir werden diese Welt verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Eifer ist bewundernswert, doch wir werden unsere Suche nicht aufgeben, bis der Fleischbildhauer vernichtet ist ... Oder bis wir einen Beweis für sein Ableben erhalten haben. Gehen wir getrennte Wege. Wenn Ihr den Haemonculus zuerst findet und sein Leben beendet, werden unsere Seher es spüren und wir werden diese Welt verlassen."

languages.text: "Hevesin takdire şayan ancak et heykeltıraşı yok edilene ya da... Bize nihayete erdiğine dair bir kanıt sunulana dek arayışımızdan vazgeçmeyeceğiz. Ayrı ayrı peşine düşelim. Eğer ki Haimonkulus'a ilk sen ulaşırsan onun hayatına son ver. Ötesezenlerimizin bunu sezmesiyle birlikte biz de bu dünyadan ayrılacağız."
languages.original_text: "Your eagerness is commendable, but we will not abandon our search until the flesh sculptor is destroyed... or until we are presented with proof of his demise. Let us pursue him separately. If you reach the Haemonculus first and cut his life short, our Farseers will feel it and we will vacate this world."

traits.locale_text: "Hevesin takdire şayan ancak et heykeltıraşı yok edilene ya da... Bize nihayete erdiğine dair bir kanıt sunulana dek arayışımızdan vazgeçmeyeceğiz. Ayrı ayrı peşine düşelim. Eğer ki Haimonkulus'a ilk sen ulaşırsan onun hayatına son ver. Ötesezenlerimizin bunu sezmesiyle birlikte biz de bu dünyadan ayrılacağız."
